features: Cascade Platinum plus Oxi ActionPacs break down food soils to clean 99% of Visible & Invisible Food Residue (inanimate in nature), providing a deep hygienic clean you can see & feel.
Platinum plus Oxi is our best stain-fighting ActionPac, fighting tough food & beverage stains for virtually spotless dishes, every time
Powerful enough to clean 24-hour stuck-on food
Convenient, premeasured ActionPac with no finicky wrapping. Phosphate free
Use with Cascade Power Dry Rinse Aid and Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner for our best clean
body.description: Cascade Platinum + Oxi ActionPacs are our most powerful ActionPacs providing a deep hygienic clean you can see & feel. It breaks down food soils to clean 99% of visible & invisible food residue (inanimate in nature), and washes them away so they do not redeposit on your dishes. Plus, Platinum + Oxi is our best stain-fighting ActionPac, fighting tough food & Beverage stains for virtually spotless dishes, every time. And it contains no Chlorine bleach. Cascade Platinum +Oxi cleans burnt-on messes in just one wash, with no pre-wash needed. That's because Platinum has 50% more cleaning power (% cleaning ingredients vs. Cascade Complete ActionPacs) to tackle burnt-on foods. It dissolves fast to start cleaning right away, releasing the soaking power of Dawn dishwashing liquid, while food-seeking enzymes latch on and break down food into particles so small they can flow right down the drain. It's so powerful it even works in the quick wash cycle. Plus, Cascade Platinum dishwashing detergent is formulated to help prevent hard-water filming-keeping your machine looking fresh and clean. Simply pop in an ActionPac and reveal a Platinum sparkle. Save up to 15 gallons of water per dishwasher load when you skip the pre-wash and run your dishwasher With Cascade Platinum. #1 Recommended Brand in North America more dishwasher brands in North America recommend Cascade vs. Any other automatic dishwashing detergent brand, recommendations as part of co-marketing agreements.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Use All 3 Products for Our Ultimate Clean Removes burnt-on food. No pre-wash needed. Dries and shines with virtually no water spots or streaks. Removes grease, odors and limescale build-up.

Cascade Platinum ActionPacs Cascade Platinum Rinse Aid Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Cleaner Cascade Platinum + Oxi ActionPacs Cascade Pure Essentials Lemon Essence ActionPacs Removes burnt-on food. No need to pre-wash. Sheeting action helps prevent water from clinging to your dishes. Remove limescale build-up, grease, and odors from your dishwasher. Cascade’s best stain fighting formula. Pure cleaning for your family. Perfume infused with essential lemon oils. Leaves Dishes Shining ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Eliminates Need to Pre-Wash ✓ ✓ ✓ Convenient Pac Form ✓ ✓ ✓ Grease Fighting Power of Dawn ✓ ✓ ✓ No Phosphates & No Chlorine Bleach ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but works well
reviews.reviewText: No spots on my dishes, no scale in my dishwasher. I think it's pricey but does the job well so I will keep buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and performs as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to dislike. Dishes are sparkly clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean dishes every time
reviews.reviewText: Worth the price. Always cleans well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works super well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is good, platinum plus smells too much
reviews.reviewText: I had tried the plus version of this and it leaves a heavy smell on the plastic dishes/cups. I think it’s the rinse agent. This one doesn’t have that strong smell, well not much of it. So this cleans great, without the heavy smell. If you think it’s just me, my dog refused to eat her bones out of a bowl washed in the plus version. But was okay with this one. Gets stuff clean, absolutely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: I have used several dish pods, but these always work the best. I don't like to scrap dishes and with these pods, I don't have to scrap everything off of them. They clean very well and don't leave a lot spots. I would recommend them to anyone looking for dishwashing pods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t believe how different my glasses looked when I switched to this from the cheap stuff I was using. They look brand new.
